How Do I Make My server say a message when som1 dose somthing like opens a door
ok ive tried a few things like adding strings to the useobject code and i think thats what ive gota do but can som1
tell me the code string thing to put into the thing so that
if (objectID == 134 && objectX == 3108 && objectY == 3353 && (playerHasItemAmount(981, 1)==true))
{

	sendMessage("Welcome");
	ReplaceObject(objectX,objectY,objectID =+ 2, 0);
            }

would also send a message to evry1 on the game saying blah has just finished the event
plz help
